name: Air Elemental Myrmidon
languages: one language of its creator's choice

traits.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmidon makes three flail attacks.

actions.name: Flail
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Strike {@recharge}
entries: The myrmidon makes one flail attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 18 (4d8 damage) lightning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.
